channel.title: Worldswitching
channel.description:
i have problems worldswitching, its not much of a problem to find out the coordinates, but my major problem is, when you click outside the area you designated with the crosshare, you have to designate it again... and when you pick colors outside of it, it gives really weird coords like -10000000000,-10000000000 and i dont want to use the client that comes with scar as it takes ages to load runescape, if anyone could help me with that, it would be nice, if you need more details please pm me or contact me on msn: paul.spiering@euronet.nl
thanks in advance
---|iloveit8|---

item.title: Worldswitching
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

premier:

activateclient; finds the rs window, but i would use a bitmap because people have diferent resolutions and would be dif coords, also then you will still need to activate client

Activate client only helps if by activating a targetted client, after switching a world the client becomes unfocused adnactivate client will not work. You must refind the RS client window by searching for it by size.

Read full topic

so… what do you have in mind on how to solve it?
